description.name: Air Filter / Regulator With Gauge 3/8"
description.long_desc:
Air Regulator with Filter provides clean and dry air which prevents damage to air tools, spray guns and pneumatic equipment.


Product Features



  • Locking control knob for pre-setting air pressure

  • Easy-to-read pressure gauge

  • Fitted with automatic drain tap


Technical Data



  • Manometer Scale: 0 - 1 MPa (0 - 150 psi)

  • Working Pressure: up to 10 bar

  • Maximum Air Pressure: 10 bar (150 psi)

  • Working Temperature: 5 - 60°C

  • Capacity: 1000 liter/min @6 bar

  • Air Inlet/Outlet: 3/8"

  • Ensured Pressure Resistance: 1,5 MPa

  • Body Material: Cast Aluminum

  • Bowl Material: Polycarbonate

  • Recommended Oil: ISO - VG32


Package Contents:



  • 1x Air Regulator

  • 1x Air Pressure Gauge

description.name: In-Line Water Trap/Filter
description.long_desc:
Filter connects directly to a Spray Gun to filter out dust, oil and water condensation.


Product Features



  • Working pressure 0-12 bar

  • Reusable filter

  • Air Inlet and Outlet 1/4"

description.name: Spray gun HVLP 1,4mm 600 ml DRAGON
description.long_desc:
HVLP type Gravity Feed Spray Gun 1,4 mm. Ideal for use with lacquers, enamels, stains, urethanes and fast dry and low viscosity paints.HVLP (High Volume Low Pressure) design prevents leaks so you never have to worry about making a mess or wasting paint. Quick and easy cleanup with the included cleaning brush and multi spanner for disassembling.


Product Features



  • HVLP type gun with reduced overspray, materials consumption, and air pollution

  • Tip size 1,4 mm

  • Aluminium housing
    • \
  • Brass needle and stainless steel nozzle

  • Adjustable fluid, fan pattern and air controls for precise application

  • Includes extra spanner and brush

  • Air inlet 1/4" hose connector


Technical Data



  • Type: HVLP

  • Feed type: gravity

  • Nozzle: 1,4 mm

  • Paint cup volume: 600 ml

  • Required air pressure: 3,0 - 4,0 bar

  • Air consumption: 170 - 310 l/min

  • Air inlet size: 1/4"

description.name: Spray gun 750cc cup with lower tank
description.long_desc:
High performance, compact and lightweight siphon fed HVLP spray gun. Can be used in a wide field such as automotive refinish and woodwork.


Product Features



  • High atomisation

  • Even paint coverage & fast operation

  • Ideal for waterborne materials

  • Complete with 750ml Suction Pot

  • Stainless steel needle and nozzle


Technical Data



  • Type: High Volume Low Pressure

  • Type of Feed: Suction

  • Fluid Tip: 1.5 mm

  • Cup Capacity: 750 ml

  • Pattern Width: 180 - 230 mm

  • Working Pressure: 3,0 - 5,0 bar

  • Air Inlet: 1/4 in.

  • Air Consumption: 90 - 230 lpm

description.name: F-2 Mini Spray gun
description.long_desc:
Mini spray gun F-2 200ml, nozzle 0.5 mm


The F-2 mini spray gun is ideal for small paint corrections (touch-ups), paintings, crafts, and covering small areas.


The HVLP (High Volume Low Presure) technology allows to obtain a large volume of paint ejected with a low air pressure pushing the paint through the nozzle. As a result, less paint is wasted with the air blown out and more rains on the painted surfaces, which reduces paint consumption.


The gun is equipped with an upper plastic gravity feed pot with a capacity of 200 ml.


Rotary nozzle enables you to change the paint flow.


The spray adjustment knob allows you to adjust the aeration of the paint particles.


The material volume control knob allows you to increase or decrease the amount of paint blown out of the nozzle.


The air pressure control knob allows you to regulate the air pressure reaching the gun from the compressor.


Application: application of primers, base varnishes, clear varnishes and one-component varnishes.


Product features



  • aluminum tank with a capacity of 200 ml

  • aluminum body

  • low volume waste material compared to high pressure guns

  • brass head

  • stainless steel nozzle and needle allow the use of water-based paints

  • ergonomic and profiled handle

  • adjustable spray width and paint flow

  • air pressure adjustment

  • extra adjustment of paint flow by rotary nozzle

  • connector 1/4"


Dane techniczne



  • Gun type: HVLP

  • Paint feed: gravity

  • Nozzle diameter: 0.5 mm

  • Flow width: 50 - 100 mm

  • Paint tank capacity: 200 ml

  • Recommended operating pressure: 2.0 - 3.5 bar

  • Air consumption: 30 - 60 liters / min

  • Connection: 1/4 "quick coupler

  • Material: stainless steel nozzle and needle; brass air head


Set includes



  • spray gun HVLP

  • paint pot of 200 ml capacity

  • key to spray gun

  • cleaning brush

description.name: Air blow gun with a nozzle
description.long_desc:
Air blow gun with short nozzle


The air blow gun is ideal for removing dirt from nooks and crannies, poorly accessible holes as well as for blowing water out of gaps.


Product features



  • easy to use

  • the tool body is made from aluminium with a stainless steel lever


Technical data



  • working pressure to 10 bar

  • maximum pressure to 15 bar

  • air inlet thread 1/4"


The set includes



  • Air blow gun with short nozzle

description.name: 8l Paint tank
description.long_desc:
Paint tank 8l

á

Paint tanká8lá+ hosesá+ gun with nozzleá2,0mm

(air consumption 115-230 l/min, air pressureá1,7-3,0 bar)

In order to start paint tank, compressedáair isánecessaryá- which is connected to the regulator.

á

The set includes:

-attested paint tank of capacityá8l, áequipped inátwo-way air regulator for regulating the pressure inside the tank, safety valve, suction head withá3/8" connector in order to connect the laquer hose to the gun,árelease valve, handle.á

-set of 3m hoses for connecting gun with tank.

-paint gunáHP with nozzleá2,0 mmá

á

Use:

-almost all paints and laquersáá- paiting without dilution, thick layer,

-contact adhesives, dispersive

-emulsion,

-wood stain,

- anti-corrosive paints, fire-proof,

- spraying wallpapers.

á

Pros:

-paiting with no refilling,

-enable fast and clean adhesive applying; adhesive may be kept in tank for long time - it does not dry out without contact with air.á

á

description.name: Recirculating sandblasting gun 1000g
description.long_desc:
Recirculating sandblasting gun  1000g


The gun is designed to remove corrosion, contamination from all kinds of steel surfaces, rims, car body parts, agricultural machines, construction machines, etc.


The gun enables the recycling of the abrasive into the material bag by pressing the gun head against the sandblasted element.


The device works with sand, glass and corundum up to a diameter of 1.4 mm.


Product features



  • operating pressure: 3.5 - 5.0 bar

  • a bag that allows sand to be reused

  • air consumption: 200 L / min

  • aluminum tank with a capacity of 1000 ml

  • precisely made, light and handy design

  • abrasive included

  • 1/4 "air connection


The set includes



  • sandblasting gun with 1L tank

  • bag for the recycling of abrasive material

  • 4 interchangeable shaped nozzles

  • 1 kg of sand

description.name: Washing gun
description.long_desc:
Pistolet do konserwacji - ropownica 950 ml

Pistolet przeznaczony do mycia, konserwacji ropą i innymi materiałami do konserwacji i zabezpieczeń antykorozyjnych. Wyposażony w zbiornik oraz długą dysze, pozwala na czyszczenie nawet w trudno dostępnych miejscach.

Cechy produktu

  • ciśnienie robocze: 4,0 - 6,0 bar
  • pojemnik ssący 950 ml z dużym otworem wlewowym, łatwy do napełniania i czyszczenia
  • precyzyjnie wykonana, lekka i poręczna konstrukcja
  • przyłącze powietrza 1/4"

description.name: Router Bits Shank 8mm 12pcs
description.long_desc:
Zestaw frezów kształtowych do drewna 12-elementowy

Zestaw 12 frezów kształtowych do drewna pozwalające na precyzyjną obróbkę materiału. Ostrza ze stali szybkotnącej HSS pozwalają na użycie frezów do obróbki drewna litego, płyty wiórowej, MDF i innych materiałów drewnopochodnych. Zastosowane łożyska, zmniejszają opór toczenia, dlatego frezy idealnie nadają się do kształtowania obłych materiałów. Całość umieszczono w praktycznej drewnianej walizce, gdzie każdy frez ma swoje podpisane miejsce.

Cechy produktu

  • 3 frezy wyposażone w łożyska
  • ostrza wykonane ze stali szybkotnącej HSS
  • frezy osadzone na trzpieniu o średnicy 8mm
  • całość zestawu w poręcznym drewnianym pudełku

Elementy zestawu: 

  • frez DIA-12.7 R-6.3
  • frez DIA-12.7 ANGLE-90°
  • frez DIA-9.5 ANGLE-90°
  • frez DIA-12.7
  • frez DIA-12.7 ANGLE-14
  • frez DIA-22 R-6.3
  • frez DIA-16
  • frez DIA-12
  • frez DIA-6
  • frez DIA-3.2
  • frez DIA-12.7 z łożyskiem
  • frez DIA-22 R-6.3
  • klucz imbusowy
  • drewniane podełko

Frez do drewna 35 x 57,5 pod puszki

Frez stosowany w stolarniach produkujących meble. Przeznaczony do robienia ślepych otworów w drewnie i materiałach drewnopochodnych o średnicy 35 mm pod zawiasy drzwiowe. Pozwala na obróbkę materiału z dokładnością do 0,08 mm. Montowany we wrzecionie o średnicy 10 mm.

description.name: Multi-Purpose Steel T-Shank Jig Saw Blades
description.long_desc:
Set of 10 HCS Jig Saw blades suitable for use on most woods including softwood, chipboard, plywood and fibre boards. Blades compatible with Bosch, DEWALT, Hitachi, Makita, Milwaukee, Metabo and Craftsman jig saws.


Product Features



  • High grade HCS steel

  • Jig Saw Blade Type: Jig Saw T-Shank

  • Compatible with Bosch, DEWALT, Hitachi, Makita, Milwaukee, Metabo and Craftsman jig saws


Blades Specification:



  • 2 pcs T111C Basic for Wood - for fast, coarse cuts in soft wood, OSB and plywood 4-50 mm thick

  • 2 pcs T101B Clean for Wood - for clean cuts in hard and soft wood, plywood, plastics, OSB, laminated particle board 3-30 mm thick

  • 2 pcs T144D Speed for Wood - for straight and very fast cuts in wood, OSB and plywood 5-50 mm thick

  • 2 pcs T101D Clean for Wood - for fast, clean cuts in hard and soft wood, plywood, plastics, OSB 10-45 mm thick

  • 2 pcs T119BO Basic for Wood - for curved cuts in soft wood, OSB, plywood 2-15 mm thick

description.name: 100W Mini Air Compressor 12/230V with Flashlight
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Powerful 100W engine

  • Easy to read gauge

  • Flashlight 5xLED

  • Fitted with Pressure Switch

  • Storage for wires and inflation needles

  • Includes 3x inflation needles


Technical Data



  • Power: 100W

  • Input Voltage: 230V AC / 12V DC

  • Flow Rate: up to 30 L/min

  • Compressor Operating Pressure: up to 5 bar

  • Compressor Gauge Pressure Range: 0 - 7 bar

  • Maximum Continuous Work Time: 20 minutes
